# selectedIndex

**Instance Property**

The currently selected index.

## Declaration

```swift
var selectedIndex: Int { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is `0`. You can only set a value that’s greater than or equal to `0` and less than [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureIndexPicker/numberOfIndexes].



## Accessing the control value

- **numberOfIndexes**: The number of index values the control provides.
